docs.snippet: French far-right leader Marine Le Pen and independent centrist Emmanuel Macron are set to make it through to the presidential election's second round in May, according to an opinion poll published on Monday, with Macron comfortably winning the run...
docs.lead_paragraph: French far-right leader Marine Le Pen and independent centrist Emmanuel Macron are set to make it through to the presidential election's second round in May, according to an opinion poll published on Monday, with Macron comfortably winning the runoff.

headline.main: France's Macron Seen Beating Le Pen, Hamon Losing Momentum-Poll

docs.snippet: Are they waiting to figure out how to turn on the lights?...
docs.lead_paragraph: What Trump has done or tried to do over the past two years — wait, it’s really only been two weeks? — is incredibly bad. But spare a bit of attention to what doesn’t seem to be happening. Has anyone heard anything, anything at all, about domestic policy development?
docs.abstract: Are they waiting to figure out how to turn on the lights?

docs.snippet: The speaker of Britain's lower house of parliament said on Monday he would not support any plans for U.S. President Donald Trump to address parliament during a state visit planned for later this year, citing Trump's temporary immigration ban as a ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The speaker of Britain's lower house of parliament said on Monday he would not support any plans for U.S. President Donald Trump to address parliament during a state visit planned for later this year, citing Trump's temporary immigration ban as a factor.

headline.main: British Speaker Opposes Letting Trump Address Parliament
